DOC.brief_summary: The aim study compare postoperative pain root canal treatment follow irrigation endodontic needle , sonic passive ultrasonic irrigation technique .
DOC.brief_title: Postoperative Pain Following Irrigation With Endodontic Needle , Sonic Passive Ultrasonic Techniques
DOC.detailed_description: Different irrigation delivery system introduce market aim improve root canal disinfection . The conventional endodontic needle commonly use ease use good control needle depth irrigant volume . However carry high risk extrude solution periapically positive pressure use solution delivery . Passive ultrasonic irrigation noncutting irrigation technique do ultrasonically activated file continuous intermittent flow irrigant . It show effective removing remnant pulp tissue , dentin debris planktonic bacteria . The vibringe ( Cavex Holland BV , Haarlem , Netherlands ) irrigation device combine manual delivery sonic activation irrigant . The aim study compare postoperative pain root canal treatment follow irrigation endodontic needle , sonic passive ultrasonic irrigation technique .
DOC.criteria: Males Females Age 1660 year old Permanent Mandibular molar : Nonvital response pulp tissue Absence spontaneous pain Pregnant females Patients significant systemic disorder Patients receive analgesic , antiinflammatory antibiotic last 24 hour Teeth : Vital pulp tissue Association swell fistulous tract Acute periapical abscess Greater grade I mobility Pocket depth great 5mm Previous endodontic treatment
